General.Name: Shaanxi Provincial Natural Gas Co Ltd
General.Description: Shaanxi Provincial Natural Gas Co.,Ltd., a natural gas company, engages in the planning, construction, operation, management, and distribution of natural gas in Shaanxi Province, China. It operates Jingbian to Xi'an, Xianyang to Baoji, Xi'an to Weinan, Baoji to Hanzhong, and Hanzhong to Ankang pipelines with a total mileage of approximately 3,300 kilometers. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Xi'an, China. Shaanxi Provincial Natural Gas Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shaanxi Gas Group Co.,Ltd.
General.Address: Xi'an Eco and Technological Dev. Zone, Xi'an, China
